Summary: Dark disc appears in a couple of shots fron the tv documentary "science and conspiracies" aired today at 9 pm eastern standard time.
divs: Sighting Detailsduring the tv documentary called " science and conspiracies ", the company EMRTC was conducting a couple of experiments using high speed cameras and a cylinder crashing into a box. The object is seen in the shot when the film is slowed down to properly see the results of the experiment. this documentary was sponsored by national goegraphic. the state director needs to get the film and have it analized. EMRTC is located in SCORRO NEW MEXICO...THIS IS WHERE THE TEST WERE CONDUCTED. THE UFO FOOTAGE IS APROXIMATELY 90 MINUTES INTO THE DOCUMENTARY. I investigate ufo sightings for mufon in new jersey. my # is 11124. ken pfeifer state section director.
